title:
Variational principles for metric mean dimension with potential of level
  sets
authors: Lucas Backes, Chunlin Liu and Fagner B. Rodrigues
abstract:
We establish three variational principles for the upper metric mean dimension
with potential of level sets of continuous maps in terms of the entropy of
partitions and Katok's entropy of the underlying system. Our results hold for
dynamical systems exhibiting the specification property. Moreover, we apply our
results to study the metric mean dimension of suspension flows.
